body.p: To help in the selection of a measurement basis, the 2018 Conceptual Framework also provides guidance on when historical cost or current value measurement bases might provide relevant information about financial assets and financial liabilities. That guidance builds on concepts identified by the Board in developing IFRS 9 Financial Instruments. The Basis for Conclusions on IFRS 9 explains why the Board decided to use those concepts.
